speaker: Sword of Stone
lines: The sword in the stone is waiting for you.
Nothing more than a unique sword lodged in a lump of rock.
As you get closer, you see an inscription on the rock.
It reads: 'To the one who can pull me from the stone, I will be yours to command.'
You reach out and touch the rock.
The rock is cold and smooth.
You feel a tingling sensation as you touch the rock.

choices.text: Attempt to pull the sword from the stone
